description: the diagrams bit works well for me. can create good looking diagrams, flow charts etc..  the higher level node part doesn't fully work; unable to update the nodes label from "empty" or properties.
Clear and simple. Only thing that does not work is export the map
Doesn't seem to be a working system anymore

description: No longer working. Doesn't even launch.

Add a start block - it comes up with a label "empty". Needs another operation to enter a titles that you want and all reasonable intuitive actions fail - double-click gives another block named empty, right-click has no useful options, toolbar is crowded with colour selectors, one for each of a dozen colours. Frankly I did not feel like spending any more time on this.
summary: KDE app less than useful since its utterly non-intuitive

description: Deux fois Semantik après quelques minutes d'utilisation s'est crashé, je suis sous Ubuntu 19.10. L'instabilité provient probablement d'une faille dans sa compatibilité espérons-la passagère, entre les deux environnements de bureau.
Tres beau design et tres utile au quotidien
summary: Une des applis les plus utiles
